content:
bjorn3 commented on Issue #807:

I think this should be moved to https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime-py.

alexcrichton commented on Issue #807:

Indeed. @gilescope if you're still interested in pursuing this and if it's still applicable to wasmtime-py, feel free to reopen!

alexcrichton closed Issue #807:

If you build with https://github.com/PyO3/maturin rather than setuptools-rust I hear it's less picky about which python version the result binds to. Might help simplify your build a bit maybe?
